text: The Last of the Clan McDuck is a comic about Scrooge McDuck. It is the first chapter of The Life and Times of Scrooge McDuck. The story is set from 1877 to 1880 when Scrooge is a child. At his 10th birthday, Scrooge goes with his father, Fergus, to visit the McDuck family castle. Fergus tells him the history of Clan McDuck. ==Other websites== *The Last of the Clan McDuck on Duckman *The Life and Times of $crooge McDuck - Episode 1 Category:DuckTales
title: The Last of the Clan McDuck
